message.name: ERR_NO_TARGET_SYSTEM
message.locale: The Content Management System has not been configured. Please contact your administrator.

message.name: ERR_MANY_TARGET_SYSTEM
message.locale: Multiple Content Management Systems have been configured. Please contact your administrator.

message.locale: The Content Management System has not been configured. Please contact your administrator.

message.name: ERR_MANY_TARGET_SYSTEM_ATOM
message.locale: Multiple Content Management Systems have been configured. Please contact your administrator.
